publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1369 Ross Finnie: The Mink Keeping (Scotland) Order 2000-That the Rural Affairs Committee recommends that the Mink Keeping (Scotland) Order 2000 (SSI 2000/400) be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
